meanings.definition: To surpass in painting skill or technique.
meanings.sent1: She outpaints all her classmates with her amazing talent.
meanings.sent2: The artist worked hard to outpaint his previous masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The young painter outpainting the older artists was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: Her brushstrokes outpaint the competition, leaving them in awe.
meanings.sent5: Watching her outpaint the others was like witnessing magic on canvas.

meanings.definition: The act of painting something outside or outdoors.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed the outpainting session in the park last weekend.
meanings.sent2: The outpainting of landscapes is a popular hobby among nature lovers.
meanings.sent3: The outpainting event turned into a fun outdoor art party.
meanings.sent4: His outpainting of the garden captured the beauty of nature perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The outpainting of the sunset on the horizon was breathtaking.
